title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1211.115 - Poisonous liquids, Class B, referenced to this section
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1211.115 - Poisonous liquids, Class B, referenced to this section

State Regulations
(a) Poisonous liquids, Class B, listed in
section
1211.150
for reference to this
section, are restricted to a maximum quantity per vehicle of 60 gallons or 1000
pounds gross weight provided, however, such liquids are in inside glass, earthenware or polyethylene containers of one gallon capacity or less, or in
metal drums or containers of five gallons or less. There are no restrictions on
the transport of empty containers which last contained such liquid provided the
accompanying shipping papers show them to be empty. (b) No empty tank vehicle which last
contained poisonous liquids, Class B, referenced to this section is allowed
passage. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
1211.115

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
